member_organisations: We have a governing board of 7 individual members, but no common membership
fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Consumer rights activities carried out with the objective of directly or indirectly influencing the formulation or implementation of consumerpolicy and the decision-making processes of the EU institutions, irrespective of where they are undertaken and of the channel or medium of communication used.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Consumer advocacy association and member organisation of BEUC working for the consumers both national and on EU and global issuses
relevant_communication: General consumer advocacy like REFIT of the Consumer Aqui and projects as: #appfail, #toyfail and "WatchOut-campaigning for better consumer rights in IoT
